nodes.label: let circle = & mut ctx . accounts . magic_circle ;
msg ! ("Magic Circle {} created with {} aether." , circle . circle_id , circle . aether_pool) ;
let caster = & mut ctx . accounts . spellcaster ;
caster . parent_circle = ctx . accounts . magic_circle . key () ;
msg ! ("Spellcaster {} of type {:?} joins the circle." , caster . caster_id , caster . caster_type) ;
let circle = & mut ctx . accounts . magic_circle ;
let master_caster = & mut ctx . accounts . master_caster ;
let apprentice_caster = & mut ctx . accounts . apprentice_caster ;

match master_caster . caster_type { CasterType :: Elementalist => { circle . aether_pool = circle . aether_pool . saturating_sub (20) ; master_caster . mastery_level = master_caster . mastery_level . saturating_add (1) ; master_caster . is_casting = master_caster . mastery_level < 50 ; } , CasterType :: Illusionist => { circle . aether_pool = circle . aether_pool . saturating_sub (15) ; master_caster . mastery_level = master_caster . mastery_level . saturating_add (2) ; master_caster . is_casting = master_caster . mastery_level < 80 ; } , CasterType :: Necromancer => { circle . aether_pool = circle . aether_pool . saturating_sub (30) ; master_caster . mastery_level = master_caster . mastery_level . saturating_add (3) ; master_caster . is_casting = master_caster . mastery_level < 100 ; } , }

match apprentice_caster . caster_type { CasterType :: Elementalist => { circle . aether_pool = circle . aether_pool . saturating_sub (20) ; apprentice_caster . mastery_level = apprentice_caster . mastery_level . saturating_add (1) ; apprentice_caster . is_casting = apprentice_caster . mastery_level < 50 ; } , CasterType :: Illusionist => { circle . aether_pool = circle . aether_pool . saturating_sub (15) ; apprentice_caster . mastery_level = apprentice_caster . mastery_level . saturating_add (2) ; apprentice_caster . is_casting = apprentice_caster . mastery_level < 80 ; } , CasterType :: Necromancer => { circle . aether_pool = circle . aether_pool . saturating_sub (30) ; apprentice_caster . mastery_level = apprentice_caster . mastery_level . saturating_add (3) ; apprentice_caster . is_casting = apprentice_caster . mastery_level < 100 ; } , }
circle . active_casters = (master_caster . is_casting as u32) + (apprentice_caster . is_casting as u32) ;
msg ! ("Spellcasters performed {} cycles of casting. Master mastery: {}, Apprentice mastery: {}." , cycles , master_caster . mastery_level , apprentice_caster . mastery_level) ;
